scripts.build: cd web && pnpm build && cd ../api && pnpm build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd web && pnpm dev" "cd api && pnpm dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd web && pnpm start" "cd api && pnpm start"
scripts.lint: cd web && pnpm lint && cd ../api && pnpm lint
scripts.check-types: cd web && pnpm check-types && cd ../api && pnpm check-types
